name: Nuri Halperin
bio:
Nuri Halperin is a software architect, speaker, and author. He helps companies design scalable systems, websites, and business applications. Heâ€™s been turning projects into success stories for a variety of clients for over 2 decades.
 
 He authored of several Pluralsight.com courses. He's also a Microsoft MVP alum, a MongoDB Champions member, and recipient of MongoDB's William Zola Award for Community Excellence. He enjoys tinkering with Arduinos, 3D printing, and robotics.
